title: Feeling yes, feeling no: the adult film
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, distributor
National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child molesting
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children and strangers
description: Provides information on how to facilitate a networking workshop for the "Feeling Yes, feeling No" program which provides information on the nature and scope of child sexual assault, the behavioural signs of the sexually assaulted child and the skills necessary to assist a sexual assault victim. Demonstrates the purpose and content of the children's films and lessons and provides parents and professionals with materials and ideas to reinforce the sexual assault prevention skills the children are taught.
